about_the_game: This demo covers from the start up to the first dungeon in the game. Create your character and explore the first few areas The Host has to offer, fight the basic monsters, grab the bow and take on the first boss. Stock up on your food and practice your dodging and blocking skills for the challenges to come! Try out one of the first mini-games and win the big prize, and witness how the cultists plan is starting to affect the world around you. This demo finishes right after you leave the first boss room.

content_descriptors.notes: Performance enhancing drugs and frequent violence
